fields.description: As a cloud user I would like to be able to discover the regions that are available so I do not have to use an external mechanism to manage region information.

comments.body: This also falls under the service management epic, EUCA-10341.

Regions from the region configuration file are now included in the EC2 DescribeRegions action response when there is a "compute" service defined for that region.

The name of the local region in the EC2 DescribeRegions response is now the value from the related region property or "eucalyptus" if not set.

Each region should be included in the output only once, if there are multiple compute service endpoints defined for a region then the first endpoint is used.

Describe regions filtering should be regression tested due to this change.
